ygData.subject: RE: Raw Materials for Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: There are 4 places that I know of to get bow parts Kelethin, there is a vendor outside on the same platform where Trueshot Bows is (way out near the Rogues
ygData.messageBody:
There are 4 places that I know of to get bow parts

Kelethin, there is a vendor outside on the same platform where Trueshot Bows
is (way out near the Rogues Guild)
South Karana, At the Centaur Village (the same guy that gives part of the
crafted armor quest)
Surefall Glade, not sure exactly who, but I think it's in the ranger guild
area
Oggok, Somewhere in Feerott near the river, between the bridge and the city
entrance (I think this right, been a long time since I played my Ogre)

The place in Kithicor mentioned earlier near the High Pass entrance only
sells arrow parts unless it was changed in the last patch, this is where I
have been buying my arrow parts now for the past 4 weeks while hunting in
the Karanas. But there has been a Ranger guild opened up in Kithicor
somewhere recently, so it could be possible someone is selling bow parts
there, but it wasn't Kyle Arrowsmith last week.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Polsfoot [mailto:polsfoot@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 8:26 PM
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] Raw Materials for Fletching


From: Tim Polsfoot <polsfoot@...>

Alright, I found components to make arrows at the hidden inn between the
two Orc camps in East Commons.

Now can anyone tell me where to find components to make bows close East
Commons or Freeport?

So far the only place I have found is in Surefall Glad and I hate to make
that long trip every time. I know there must be someplace close to Freeport.

Thanks in advance for any help you can give a beginner (lvl 74) Fletcher.

Giea of Qeynos
